mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cc_member (uid, email, nick, password, create_dt, created_by) VALUES (#{uid}, #{email}, #{nick}, #{password}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
mapper.select: SELECT m.uid, nick, email, password, d.avatar FROM cc_member m LEFT JOIN cc_member_detail d ON m.uid = d.uid WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT email, nick, phone, IFNULL (info, 'N') info , avatar FROM cc_member m LEFT JOIN cc_member_detail d ON m.uid = d.uid WHERE m.uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cc_member_detail (uid, nick, phone, info, avatar) VALUES (#{uid}, #{nick}, #{detail.phone}, #{detail.info}, #{detail.avatar}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE nick = #{nick}, phone = #{detail.phone}, info = #{detail.info}, avatar = IFNULL(#{detail.avatar}, avatar)
